revised_title: Investigations on the Properties of Dielectrics and Electromotive Force of Polarisation
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on dielectrics, including Iceland Spar and quartz, to study the residual discharge and the electromotive force of polarization. They found that the decay of polarization in dielectrics causes the residual discharge and that the specific inductive capacity and residual capacity of dielectrics depend on the time of charging and the frequency of the alternating current.
